org.fcrepo.indexer

Interface Indexer<Content>

  • Type Parameters:
    Content - the type of content to index
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AsynchIndexer, BasePersistenceIndexer, ElasticIndexer, FileSerializer, JcrXmlPersistenceIndexer, RdfPersistenceIndexer, SolrIndexer, SparqlIndexer, SynchIndexer

    public interface Indexer<Content>
    Main interface for individual indexers to implement. Each type of destination (Solr, triplestore, files, etc.) should have its own implementation. Abstract classes AsynchIndexer and SynchIndexer are provided for convenience.
    Since:
    Aug 19, 2013
    Author:
    ajs6f, Esm√© Cowles

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Indexer.IndexerType
      Types of content processed by Indexers.
      static interface  Indexer.NoContent
      Class for indexers that do not actually accept content.
